channel.title: Personal on Yogesh Dhimate
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Yogesh Dhimate

item.title: Recap of 2020
item.description: The end of the year is the time to pause, look back, and think about how the year went by. I am very grateful and fortunate to had an opportunity to enjoy a reasonably good time in 2020. On the personal front We visited our families in India in January. I enjoyed meeting my parents, brother, in-laws, and friends. I did not travel for work and got more time to spend with my wife.
